title: A Dupeless Thread : 5 Down 7 To Go
author: frankbmd

posts.post_title: A Dupeless Thread : 5 Down 7 To Go
posts.post_content:
Help me become dupeless by considering the purchase of the following dozen cards.  All prices now end in 8 and include postage.  Funds are net to me by whatever means you desire.  I will not rule out the possibility of volume discounts.

Disclaimer:  All the cards are undergraded and appear better in hand.:D

Fred AbbottBVG4.5Piedmont 350 $OLD

[IMG]https://www.collectorfocus.com/images/show/frankbmd/duplicates/21594/abbott[/IMG]

Roger Bresnahan (Bat)SGC50Piedmont 350 $178.00

[IMG]https://www.collectorfocus.com/images/show/frankbmd/duplicates/53827/bresnahan-bat-hof[/IMG]

Ray DemmittBVG3Piedmont 350 $38.00

[IMG]https://www.collectorfocus.com/images/show/frankbmd/duplicates/47874/demmitt-ny[/IMG]

Mike Donlin (Fielding)SGC35Sweet Caporal 150     $48.00

[IMG]https://www.collectorfocus.com/images/show/frankbmd/duplicates/37439/donlin-fielding[/IMG]439/donlin-fielding

Fielder Jones (Portrait)PSA3Piedmont 350  $OLD

[IMG]https://www.collectorfocus.com/images/show/frankbmd/t206-psa/10450/jones-f-por[/IMG]

Red Murray (Bat)BVG5Sweet Caporal 350$OLD

[IMG]https://www.collectorfocus.com/images/show/frankbmd/duplicates/10171/murray-batting[/IMG]

Mickey Doolin (Portrait)REl Principe De Gales (with cTisdel stamp)   Note this card is also signed by Tisdel and the second owner Gordon Souttar.  If requested, I will sign it as well.   $OLD

[IMG]https://www.collectorfocus.com/images/show/frankbmd/duplicates/10933/doolin-portrait-epdg[/IMG]

Bob Rhoades (Hands at Chest)BVG4Piedmont 350$48.00

[IMG]https://www.collectorfocus.com/images/show/frankbmd/duplicates/10188/rhoades-ready-to-pitch[/IMG]

Wilbur GoodeSGC50Sweet Caporal Fact 649 OP$58.00

[IMG]https://www.collectorfocus.com/images/show/frankbmd/duplicates/14496/goode-649[/IMG]

Harry Steinfeldt (Por)  SGC  30   Sweet Caporal 350 Fact 25$OLD

[IMG]https://www.collectorfocus.com/images/show/frankbmd/duplicates/10317/steinfeldt-portrait[/IMG]

Frank Smith (F Smith)BVG3.5Piedmont 150$48.00

[IMG]https://www.collectorfocus.com/images/show/frankbmd/duplicates/10207/smith-f[/IMG]

Charley O’Leary (Hands on Knees)SGC80Sweet Caporal 350     $188.00

[IMG]https://www.collectorfocus.com/images/show/frankbmd/duplicates/37494/oleary-hands-on-knees[/IMG]
I will take the Doolin EPDG
I'd like Harry Steinfeldt   Sending PM

[quote name="JCC" post=1814070]I will take the Doolin EPDG[/QUOTE]

Sweet pick up.

I have an EPDG Red Dooin with same stamp and signature.  But not second owner's sig.  Interestingly enough, mine also has the number 150 on it.  I always though it was Nelson's numbering system.  But with same number, who knows ???

Fun stuff, Scott

Thanks!  I'm excited to add this to my collection.  The backstory Frank researched on these cards is remarkable.  Amazing bridge created between collectors across generations.

Maybe I should have added a “0” to the asking price.:D

Sure....as long as it was in the front........:D

Buy now,

when the original monster number set is consigned to Heritage, you will not be able to afford it.;)
May I suggest the next bump at 59 days.
